ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor

Interface GameObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Collectable, FreezePowerDown, GameItem, ImmortalPowerUp, Obstacle, Player

    public interface GameObject
    Empty interface for all GameObjects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getBounds()
      Will create a new Rectangle to represent the bounds of a GameObject.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Each GameObject will have a name (can be the class name).
      void handleCollision(CollisionType collisionType)
      Method which can be called to tell a GameObject it collided with something

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Each GameObject will have a name (can be the class name).
        Returns:
        String with the name of a GameObject

      • handleCollision

        void handleCollision(CollisionType collisionType)
        Method which can be called to tell a GameObject it collided with something

      • getBounds

        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getBounds()
        Will create a new Rectangle to represent the bounds of a GameObject.
        Returns:
        Rectangle based on the position, width and height.
